items.name: clerk-convex-starter
items.title: Clerk + Convex Starter
items.description: Complete Next.js starter with Clerk authentication and Convex backend. Includes auth UI, real-time database, and example queries.

items.name: clerk-quickstart
items.title: Clerk Next.js Quickstart (App Router)
items.description: Complete authentication setup with Clerk for Next.js App Router. Includes sign-in/sign-up pages, middleware, header with auth buttons, and dark mode support.

items.title: Example Form
items.description: A contact form with Zod validation.

items.title: Complex Component
items.description: A complex component showing hooks, libs and components.

items.name: example-with-css
items.title: Example with CSS
items.description: A login form with a CSS file.
